Utterance: Standby power, also known as vampire power, refers to the energy consumed by electronic devices when they are plugged in but not in use. Utterance: Power strips act as a central control point for multiple electronics. By plugging devices into a power strip, you can easily turn off the entire strip with a single switch when the devices are not in use. This eliminates standby power consumption and ensures that no energy is wasted.
